25544.name: ISS-APRS
25544.ssh_command: timeout {duration} rtl_fm -M fm -f {freq} -s {rate} -g 40 - | sox -t raw -r {rate} -e signed-integer -b 16 -c 1 - /home/pi/{filename}.wav
